title: Leading primetime TV programming genres viewed in the U.S. 2015
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of respondents for 15 number of Responses.
Response Sitcoms or comedy has the highest Share of respondents and Soap operas has the lowest Share of respondents.
The highest Response Sitcoms or comedy has 44.0 more Share of respondents than the lowest Response Soap operas.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Response in the x axis and Share of respondents in the y axis.
The maximum Share of respondents 48.0 is found at Response Sitcoms or comedy and the minimum is found at Soap operas where Response is 4.0.
